channel.title: Teleblocked after entering a portal
channel.description: What I am trying to do making a recipe for disaster minigame but I have to make the heightlevel = 2. My teleports at disabled and I do not want them enabled. I want people to be teleblocked after entering the portal because my teleports are on emotes and if they use emotes, they'll be in the air. Plus I want my minigame to be for advanced people >.<.

item.title: Teleblocked after entering a portal
item.dc:creator: @n0va_k0 n0va k0
item.description:
@n0va_k0 wrote:

No errors, I only added the teleblock true XD. Going to test and x0, The area I am using is the real rfd fights. If I don’t put a height level, you will be under the area and the only way to get back to the right heightlevel if I use emotes, is if I add heightlevel = 0; to all of them which I don’t feel like doing. Teleports the only way to get the right heightlevels normally, I don’t want them enabled. (noobs abuse)

Read full topic

item.title: Teleblocked after entering a portal
item.dc:creator: @x0_0wn x0 0wn
item.description:
@x0_0wn wrote:

Or, just make it to the tabs take you to the correct height level!!!
:o

Read full topic

item.title: Teleblocked after entering a portal
item.dc:creator: @zubmage zubmage
item.description:
@zubmage wrote:

Try this:

case PORTALID: teleportToX = BLAH; teleportToY = BLAH; teleblock = true; } } break;

Read full topic

item.title: Teleblocked after entering a portal
item.dc:creator: @n0va_k0 n0va k0
item.description:
@n0va_k0 wrote:

case 7321: // RFD gloves game teleportToX = 1902; teleportToY = 5361; heightLevel = 2; sendMessage("Welcome Warrior, Here you must kill unusual beasts to get"); sendMessage("very powerful gloves, Richard sells them but watch out"); sendMessage("The monsters are much more stronger than you'd expect"); break;

Won’t work with my codes :[

Read full topic

item.title: Teleblocked after entering a portal
item.dc:creator: @zubmage zubmage
item.description:
@zubmage wrote:

Oh sorry.

Here:

case PORTALID: client c = (client) PlayerHandler.players[PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name)]; c.teleportToX = BLAH; c.teleportToY = BLAH; c.teleblock = true; } } break;

Read full topic

item.title: Teleblocked after entering a portal
item.dc:creator: @n0va_k0 n0va k0
item.description:
@n0va_k0 wrote:

I want it to be a portal >.>…, but if no one knows how to make someone tbed after going through one, I’ll use a command.

Thanks

Read full topic

item.title: Teleblocked after entering a portal
item.dc:creator: @zubmage zubmage
item.description:
@zubmage wrote:

Here:

if (command.startsWith("COMMAND")) { client c = (client) PlayerHandler.players[PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name)]; c.teleportToX = BLAH; c.teleportToY = BLAH; c.teleblock = true;

Read full topic
